channel.title: [317] Dodian XIV - OLD SCHOOL ECO!
channel.description:
[center][SIZE=5][FONT=Impact]Dodian XIV[/FONT][/SIZE]
FORUMS: [URL=http://"http://www.dodianxiv.com"]www.dodianxiv.com[/URL]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=dodianxiv.no-ip.org][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/dodianxiv.no-ip.org.png[/img][/url]
All Dodian Skills work! Original Eco based Server! Multiple bosses, never seen before! Barrows minigame!
This server is meant for the players who enjoyed Dodian when it was at its prime. It does not have many of the features new servers have now'a'days but its still fun! Play yourself, and reminisce about the good old Dodian days!
Client Download: [b]14mb[/b][url=http://uppit.com/oijhw5d7neuk/DodianXIV.rar]Download DodianXIV.rar @ UppIT[/url] Webclient: Use moparscape webclient and put the IP: dodianxiv.no-ip.org
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/zojb6s.png[/img]
